channel.title: My First Sword Attempt [Angel Blade]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am really getting into modeling and I made my very first sword. it looks very good and I might release it for you guys to use. Here are some pictures (wireframe included)
Here is the equip model without the wireframe [IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage-4.jpg[/img] And the equip model with the wireframe [IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage2-3.jpg[/img] Now for the drop model without wireframe [IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage3-2.jpg[/img] And finally, the drop model with the wireframe [IMG]http://i868.photobucket.com/albums/ab246/triplehhhhhh/NewBitmapImage4-2.jpg[/img]
Remember that this is my first attempt, so please no hate comments. And I might release this if this thread gets popular and lots of requests for a release. By the way, I didn't show the back side because its all coloured black, if you want me to release it with the back side coloured then I'll do so. But I left it all black for you to colour it and customize. :)

@usman555 wrote:

Hey guys, I am really getting into modeling and I made my very first sword. it looks very good and I might release it for you guys to use. Here are some pictures (wireframe included)

Here is the equip model without the wireframe

Remember that this is my first attempt, so please no hate comments. And I might release this if this thread gets popular and lots of requests for a release.
By the way, I didn’t show the back side because its all coloured black, if you want me to release it with the back side coloured then I’ll do so. But I left it all black for you to colour it and customize.
